title: Pixel 3a requests "Password required after device restarts"
content:
Entering my Google password does not work. Entering my PIN set for my phone does not work. I have no other password/PIN allocated for my phone.
I have always used the fingerprint recognition or entered my PIN, so why is the phone now requesting for a password.
My phone had not restarted, I was just away from it for an hour or so and when I tried to unlock it I received the "Password required after device restarts"
What is the password that it is after, really frustrating. :(
Any solutions on how to resolve without a factory reset?
